Challenge #2.spoken_text: Can you do me a favor and photocopy these documents for me, please?

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I need them for the staff meeting tomorrow morning.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: There will be fifteen attendees.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Hi, Grace.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Unfortunately, the copy machine is out of order.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: The repairman is supposed to come this afternoon to take a look,

Challenge #8.spoken_text: but this is the second time it's broken down in the past two weeks,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: so it might not be fixable.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Oh no. I need the copies by 7:30 AM to prepare the folders for the meeting.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: Could you run over to our branch in Marple?

Challenge #12.spoken_text: It's only a 10-minute drive.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: I just need to make sure I'm prepared for this meeting.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Yeah, I can do that.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: I actually did my training at the Marple office, so I'm familiar with it.

Challenge #17.spoken_text: Are these all the documents you need?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: It looks like Antonio Garks is going to take over as production manager at our factory in Vietnam

Challenge #3.spoken_text: while Susan Carter is out on maternity leave.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: The post lasts six months.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Wow, I haven't seen that email yet.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Did the email say when he was flying out?

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Not for a few months, at the beginning of January.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Well the project in Southampton won't be finished by January.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I wonder who will fill his position there.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: The email didn't say, so I'm assuming they haven't made that decision.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I personally think that Jesse Key would excel in that position.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: I agree.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: She is very good at jumping in a situation and making it her own.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: It would be a great test, as she hasn't worked on a project of this size before.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: She has done a great job,

Challenge #16.spoken_text: but I am not sure if she is quite ready for this challenge.

Challenge #17.spoken_text: I guess we will see how things progress.

Challenge #18.spoken_text: The email also said upper management will be holding a meeting about this subject tomorrow,

Challenge #19.spoken_text: and they ask you to RSVP, so be sure to respond.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: Is Mrs. Hayley in?

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I'm one of her clients.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Mrs. Hayley is traveling abroad until the end of next week.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Is it urgent?

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I can try to reach her at the resort.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: No need for that.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: I just came by to drop off these documents she asked me to sign.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: Can I leave them with you?

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Sure, no problem!

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I'll let her know you dropped them off and give them to her when she returns.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Here's a post-it, can you write down what it's about so she knows?

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Sure, I'll do that.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hi, I'm calling to get an update on a claim I filed.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: It's for an emergency dental surgery I had while on vacation.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: Sure, I can help with that.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Do you remember when you submitted the claim?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I filed it on December 27th, so about a month ago.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I see.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Normally, it takes about six weeks to resolve,

Challenge #8.spoken_text: but because of the holidays, it might take up to eight weeks.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: Can you give me the 8-digit reference number?

Challenge #10.spoken_text: I'll get back to you within 72 hours with an update.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Good afternoon, this is Harry Stills.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I'm calling regarding a delivery I was expecting.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I placed an order for a computer yesterday and paid for the expedited shipping.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: It was supposed to be here by noon,

Challenge #5.spoken_text: but here we are, two hours later, and I am still waiting.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I'm sorry about that.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: The delivery crew actually just called us to let us know he had a flat tire

Challenge #8.spoken_text: and was running behind on his deliveries.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: He is back on the road and should arrive in the next thirty minutes.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Are you sure?

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I have to leave in forty minutes for an appointment,

Challenge #12.spoken_text: so I need to make sure I have it before then.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: I understand.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: I will call him right now and ask him to make sure you are the first stop he makes in the neighborhood.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: I want to apologize for the delay.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: Only one person working at the check-in counter,

Challenge #3.spoken_text: and it's going to take ages to get our luggage sorted.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: They're definitely understaffed.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: We should get priority boarding, or we might miss the flight.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Sounds like a plan, but I don't carry cash anymore.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Do you think they take traveler's checks?

Challenge #8.spoken_text: No worries, I got my credit card with me,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: it should work fine.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: I just got the invitation to the workshop on Monday.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: It seems very interesting,

Challenge #3.spoken_text: the topic is "Designing for the minimalist".

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Do you think you will go?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Oh, that does sound very interesting.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I'm seeing a trend in minimalism design with my clients.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: I haven't checked my email,

Challenge #8.spoken_text: what time is the workshop?

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I have a presentation on Tuesday, so I am pretty busy until then.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: It starts at 9 A.M.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: And is scheduled to last for an hour.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: The email also mentioned free coffee and donuts.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Luckily, it is a small workshop,

Challenge #14.spoken_text: so will be held in the meeting room next to your office.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: They said there will be a few hands-on events.

Challenge #16.spoken_text: Can I do anything to help you out with your presentation?

Challenge #17.spoken_text: Well, if it is only an hour, I should be able to attend.

Challenge #18.spoken_text: It is a good way to start my busy day!

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I have an appointment with Dr. Coleman at 4 PM tomorrow,

Challenge #3.spoken_text: but my head has been pounding since yesterday.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Could you schedule me for this afternoon instead?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I'm sorry, but Dr. Coleman is out of town for personal reasons.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: The earliest we can schedule you is 8 AM tomorrow.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: I don't think I can wait until tomorrow.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: That's why I called in the first place.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: If you don't mind, Dr. Roberto is available.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: He's our on-call doctor and can see patients.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: There's an opening at 2 PM today.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Would you like to see him?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I bought a pair of dress shoes from your online store,

Challenge #3.spoken_text: but they're too tight because I got narrow width instead of medium.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: What can I do?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Sorry about that.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Shoes do stretch with wear,

Challenge #7.spoken_text: but you can return them by mail or at one of our outlets.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Driving across town is too much hassle for me.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: How do I return them by mail?

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Just fill out the exchange form on the packing slip,

Challenge #11.spoken_text: attach a shipping label,

Challenge #12.spoken_text: and mail them back in the original packaging.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I rented a car from your shop.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: However, I just found a tear in the driver's seat.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I didn't notice it when I picked up the rental vehicle this morning.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: So I'm a bit concerned about whether I might have to pay for any repairs.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Well, not to worry, Mrs. Burton.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: According to our database,

Challenge #8.spoken_text: your insurance package covers any damage to the vehicle,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: so it will reimburse the expenses if needed.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: That's great news.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: One quick question, though,

Challenge #12.spoken_text: do I need to top off the tank when I return the car tomorrow?

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Yes, please.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: By the way, there will be some paperwork to get through,

Challenge #15.spoken_text: so please give yourself enough time.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: How may I help you?

Challenge #3.spoken_text: Hi, I'd like to make a reservation for 3 for 6 o'clock this Saturday in the name of Josh Price.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I'm afraid we're fully booked at that time.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Could an earlier or later time suit you?

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I can fit you in at 5 or 7:30.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Well, 5 o'clock is a bit early for dinner.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Let's make it 7:30 then.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I might have to get back to you because I'm not too sure.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: No problem, Mr. Price.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: Your table will be kept for 15 minutes.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: May I also have your phone number, please?

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Excuse me, do you have Paul Woodward's latest novel?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: Do you mean The Ebony Snowman?

Challenge #3.spoken_text: Yeah! Do you have it in hardcover?

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Sorry, the hardcover's been sold out for a while.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: But the paperback just came out this week, and we've got plenty.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Oh, wow. It seems like everyone loves his books.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Yeah! plus some big bloggers gave it great reviews,

Challenge #8.spoken_text: so it's been flying off the shelves.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: That's actually how I heard about it.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Where can I find it?

Challenge #11.spoken_text: We're in the new releases section.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Just head straight to the bestsellers section,

Challenge #13.spoken_text: and you'll find his books right after that.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: Glad to see you made it back before the shop closed!

Challenge #3.spoken_text: Did the meeting with the district manager go well?

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I would say it went pretty well.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I was surprised that she made a couple of suggestions for how we can increase the sales at our store.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Hmm... interesting.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: I thought our sales were pretty high.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: What suggestions did she make?

Challenge #9.spoken_text: She would like us to highlight our sale items in the front window.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: As you know, once a T-shirt or a pair of trousers are reduced,

Challenge #11.spoken_text: it moves to the back of the store in the sale section.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: She is concerned our customers don't know about this part of the store.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Oh, I never thought of that.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: I can begin working on the displays right now.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: That would be great, thank you.

Challenge #16.spoken_text: Don't forget, we never put our top selling items on sale,

Challenge #17.spoken_text: so you don't need to make a sign for that.

Challenge #18.spoken_text: Sarah is almost finished cashing out that customer,

Challenge #19.spoken_text: so I will have her assist you when she's finished.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I wanted to reach out regarding your application for the copywriter position at The Everyday Bank.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: My name is Quint Daniels,

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I am the head of HR.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: We would like to invite you in for an interview

Challenge #6.spoken_text: and wanted to check your availability for this week?

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Good morning, Mr. Daniels.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: I appreciate you reaching out.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I am actually out of town and flying back tomorrow,

Challenge #10.spoken_text: so I am not available until Thursday or Friday.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: That isn't a problem.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Are you available to come in at noon on Thursday?

Challenge #13.spoken_text: The next step will consist of two parts,

Challenge #14.spoken_text: a small writing challenge and a conversation with the content team.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: The whole process should take about an hour,

Challenge #16.spoken_text: so we can have you out the door by 1.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hilary, are you able to help me out?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: My computer keeps disconnecting from the wifi and I don't know what to do.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: Normally, I will Google whatever the problem is, but I can't even do that!

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Ah, I'm sorry Steve.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I'm on my way to lunch with a client and already running late.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I won't be back for about two hours,

Challenge #7.spoken_text: but I can try to help you then.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Andrew helped me with my computer yesterday,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: maybe he is available now.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Hmm... I can't wait that long.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I have a lot of work to get done this morning and afternoon.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: I will walk down to the technology department and see if he is available to help me.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: That's a better idea.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Good luck!

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Have you two taken a look at the progress they've made upstairs on the office expansion?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: It looks great!

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I know!

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I can't believe it!

Challenge #5.spoken_text: And the offices up there have amazing views of the city.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I wonder which division will move up there when it's finished.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: I heard it's the research department.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Ah, because they have the most people.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: Probably.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: I'd love to have an office on that floor, though.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: Yeah.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Well, the company must be making good money if they're adding that space!

Challenge #13.spoken_text: I think you're right, there!

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I hear your agency is managing the largest luxury condo complex yet.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: How's the presale going?

Challenge #4.spoken_text: You mean Albert Park?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Yeah, homes are just flying off the shelf.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I'm surprised there's been so much interest in this residential development.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: That's true, considering the hefty price tag.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: But actually, my wife and I are interested since this condo complex is brand new and so close to everything.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: Oh, really?

Challenge #10.spoken_text: We're doing a special promotion.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: If you buy a unit, you get the maximum level of protection for your new home

Challenge #12.spoken_text: thanks to our extended new home warranty.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: That's fantastic!

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Could you tell me more about the proposed amenities?

Challenge #15.spoken_text: Sure, I'd be happy to give you a brochure.

Challenge #16.spoken_text: Hold on It's in my car.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hello, I bought a laptop here a while back.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: Recently, I've been having major battery life issues.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: A full charge used to last about 5 hours,

Challenge #4.spoken_text: but now my laptop runs out of charge rapidly.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Umm This is SuperPad 4.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Did you apply the latest firmware and driver updates?

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Yeah, back in September, if my memory serves me right.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Well, this particular firmware update was supposed to enhance battery performance,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: but ever since the recent September update,

Challenge #10.spoken_text: many people have complained about a battery drain of 20%

Challenge #11.spoken_text: even when the machine is turned off.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: That's a real curveball.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: I know battery performance is not covered by the warranty the same way other components are.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: So what would be my best course of action for now?

Challenge #15.spoken_text: Well, you just have to wait until the company rolls out new updates.

Challenge #16.spoken_text: The tech giant is said to be working on a solution.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Sharon, how was the feedback on our new mascaras?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: Did we stand out from other brands?

Challenge #3.spoken_text: The product has been a success overall.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: However, we did receive a number of complaints from the customers

Challenge #5.spoken_text: saying that the product didn't live up to their expectations.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: In what aspects exactly?

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Most complaints are about the products not being clearly labeled.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: The consumers feel cheated

Challenge #9.spoken_text: because our mascaras boast an organic formula,

Challenge #10.spoken_text: when, in fact, only a small part of the ingredients are.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I think we should arrange a discussion with the graphic designers and our product development teams.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: For sure.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: We should come up with a solution to the problem as soon as possible.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: I'll reserve the boardroom for tomorrow morning right away.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: Your shop is having a year-end closeout sale this month, right?

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I saw the advertisement on the Internet.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I'm curious, though, does the sale apply to all the products on display?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Certainly, they are all 60% off the retail price.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Today only, if you have a Wsun Bank's credit card,

Challenge #7.spoken_text: you can get an extra 5% off just by using the bank's credit card.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Actually, I do, but I left it at the office.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I'd better run now,

Challenge #10.spoken_text: but I'm definitely coming back to get the extra discount.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hi, I'd like to order a large Super Supreme pizza

Challenge #2.spoken_text: and a small double pepperoni pizza with extra cheese

Challenge #3.spoken_text: and extra jalapeno peppers on both.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I want both pizzas to go, by the way.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I'm sorry. The Super Supreme pizza is a specialty offered in certain outlets only.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Would you like to try our new stuffed crust pizza instead?

Challenge #7.spoken_text: You may choose up to five toppings for just 17.99.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Thanks, but I've been meaning to try this specialty pizza for a while.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: Could you point me to another outlet that serves it?

Challenge #10.spoken_text: I live just outside Steveston Village.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: No problem. Hold on...

Challenge #12.spoken_text: uhh, the nearest branch for you is on Moncton Street.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: You might want to call the place first at 888-555-7625.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Better act quickly.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: I heard this outlet sells out fast.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Good morning, am I speaking with Rick Rows?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I'm Geri Calwell, from the head office.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I am still waiting for the expense reports from January.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: The deadline for the reports is always on the 15th of the next month,

Challenge #5.spoken_text: so I was wondering if something came up?

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Hi, Geri. I'm sorry about that,

Challenge #7.spoken_text: but I actually sent them off on the 12th using the interoffice mail.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: I even remember placing them in the outgoing tray.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: That's bizarre.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Hmm... Yeah, this has never happened before.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I will double check with the other departments

Challenge #12.spoken_text: as maybe they got delivered somewhere else in the building.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Just in case, can you email me the reports as soon as possible?

Challenge #14.spoken_text: I need to work on the report this afternoon,

Challenge #15.spoken_text: so I will need a digital copy, just this once.

Challenge #16.spoken_text: I actually have a meeting at the head office in about an hour.

Challenge #17.spoken_text: I can quickly print another report and drop it off to your office before my meeting, if that suits you?

Challenge #19.spoken_text: I am on the fourth floor, office 402.

Challenge #20.spoken_text: If for some reason I'm not in my office,

Challenge #21.spoken_text: please leave it on my desk.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I'm Alex Jones, and my position is Head of People here at J.P. Bank.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I know you recently had an interview with the head of the Canal branch,

Challenge #4.spoken_text: and he was very impressed.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I'm calling today to offer you the job.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Wow, thank you!

Challenge #7.spoken_text: I am very excited,

Challenge #8.spoken_text: but I am currently still working,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: so I need to resign, which I can do today.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: When did you want me to start?

Challenge #11.spoken_text: Well, as we mentioned in your interview,

Challenge #12.spoken_text: we were hoping the successful candidate would be able to start next week.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: The branch manager said he would make a special exception for you,

Challenge #14.spoken_text: as he thinks you would be a great team member.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: We can extend the start date by an additional week,

Challenge #17.spoken_text: I think I can make that work,

Challenge #18.spoken_text: but I should check with my line manager.

Challenge #19.spoken_text: I have been treated well by my current company,

Challenge #20.spoken_text: so I don't want to leave them high and dry.

Challenge #21.spoken_text: I am very excited to move.

Challenge #22.spoken_text: How should I contact you after I speak with my manager?

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hi George, we really need to figure out a strategic communications campaign for our new jeans line.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I agree.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: The line has been completed and we are ready to release it,

Challenge #4.spoken_text: so the time has come to hire a public relations agency to oversee the launch.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I agree, but our budget for advertising is very low for this project.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I am a little bit stressed that we won't be able to afford a company.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Have you reached out to any agencies that are near us for an estimate?

Challenge #8.spoken_text: I have worked with an agency called Watergate in the past,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: and I remember they were very cost-effective.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: The agency did a great job, do you remember, Daniel?

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I remember working with them on a lipstick launch.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: They were a great match.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Oh, fantastic!

Challenge #14.spoken_text: I will reach out to them to see if we can arrange a meeting.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: Thanks, guys!

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Can you help me order a new office chair for the new assistant?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: No problem.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: Do you want me to take a look at the catalog?

Challenge #4.spoken_text: It has chairs that swivel and turn and the ones that tilt back and forward.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: That won't be necessary.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Just order an office chair that will allow her to adjust the height and comfort level.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Hmm Also, keep in mind that our budget per chair is $70 maximum.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Well, in that case, I think we need to contact a new supplier.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: Our current vendor has raised its prices.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Really? Do you have someone in mind?

Challenge #11.spoken_text: Yeah, a potential supplier just sent us a catalog a few days ago.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: I'll take a look at the prices and place your order.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hey, James, let's go see the musical play Spear Of Hope while we're in New York.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: Sounds good.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I read a rave review of the play in the paper last week.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: It is said that the staging and costumes are really something to see.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I think we should buy tickets in advance.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Good idea.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: I have a PhantomSeat member account,

Challenge #8.spoken_text: so if I book online on this website,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I can get a maximum of two tickets at a discount price.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: So when do you think we should go?

Challenge #11.spoken_text: It is your call.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: I wonder if the price is cheaper on weekdays.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: I guess so.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Let me check the website...

Challenge #15.spoken_text: Hmm, it seems like the price is a bit more expensive on weekends.

Challenge #16.spoken_text: Say we go on Thursday at 8 P.M.

Challenge #19.spoken_text: We could probably grab a bite to eat before the show.

Challenge #20.spoken_text: Could you book the tickets for us?

Challenge #22.spoken_text: I'll go get my credit card.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I saw on the University's online job board that you were looking to hire a student receptionist.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: Have you filled the position?

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Hi, there.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: We haven't filled the position, but have begun looking over applications.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: We plan to conduct the interviews beginning on Monday.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Would you like to fill out an application?

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Well, I am very interested,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: but I am taking the maximum amount of credit hours.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Does the job guarantee flexibility?

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I am concerned that with twenty credit hours, I may not be available as much as the job requires.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: There's some flexibility involved,

Challenge #13.spoken_text: and occasionally, we hire two students to fill one role if it works with their class schedule.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Please attach a copy of this semester's class schedule to your application.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: This way we can determine the optimal workload for you.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Do you know how many people have signed up for our marketing conference at the hotel next week?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: So far we have 50 attendees,

Challenge #3.spoken_text: but people are still signing up.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Yesterday, we had 10 new registrations.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Do you want to see the list of people who have paid?

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I have to jump on a conference call in five minutes, so I don't have time right now.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Will you just email me an updated list at the end of the day?

Challenge #8.spoken_text: No problem.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I also keep a list of people who signed up for our monthly newsletter,

Challenge #10.spoken_text: so I will highlight names of people who haven't signed up,

Challenge #11.spoken_text: maybe we should reach out to them personally.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: I am going ahead and starting installing the new doorknobs on all the doors on the third floor.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: Have you got anything else that needs to be done more urgently?

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I actually just got an email from Mr. Wilson on the third floor.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: He says that his projector is acting up.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Oh yeah, those things often do.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I'm going to go ahead and work on the doorknobs

Challenge #7.spoken_text: and then will work on the projector when the students are out of the building later this afternoon.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: He mentioned that he is hoping to use the projector for a project in an hour.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I know his students are at lunch until 1 P.M.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: So would you be able to go have a quick look now, please?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: The townhouse is conveniently located, and the neighborhood is fairly safe.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I'm curious, though.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Do you help arrange mortgages with any banks?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I know I want the principal and interest payments to be predictable.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Certainly.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: This brochure here lists all the banking partners that our agency has been working closely with.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: And a word of advice,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: a down payment of 20% or more will help you get a lower interest rate.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Thanks!

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I'll take a look at it.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Hopefully, I'm eligible to apply for a home loan.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: My pleasure.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Please feel free to contact me for any further information.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: You can reach me at my office number.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hi Elizabeth, please take a seat, make yourself at home.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I called you up here because I have some bad news.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I just looked at the end of the month reports and they aren't good.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: For the fifth month in a row, our profits have dropped.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: This time, by 8%.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Ugh, I am sorry, Mr. Park.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: I don't know what to say, but I share your disappointment.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Our crew is very dedicated,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: but for some reason, we haven't been seeing the results we expected.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Well, we need to find a solution.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I am prepared to find new sales agents if that's what needs to be done.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: I don't think we need to lay anyone off.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: I've been speaking to sources at other companies and it seems like everyone is having this problem.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: This time of year has always been a hard time to close deals.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: I am going to mix up the sales teams and see if that makes any difference.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Robin, I've got Sycamore Properties on the line.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: They want to change their reservation.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I'm locked out of the booking system for some reason.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Could you help me with that?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Sure. What's their reservation number?

Challenge #7.spoken_text: They would like to change the check-in date from May 17 to May 19

Challenge #8.spoken_text: and change their rooms to courtyard rooms with no views.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: Hmm. Those rooms seem to be in high demand during that time,

Challenge #10.spoken_text: but let me double check.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: Umm, yeah, we can accommodate that.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Another company just canceled on us.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Great!

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Oh, and they would like to reserve a limousine service.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: Well, I'll have to call our usual private shuttle service and get a quick note.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hello, this is David Mann speaking.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I'd like to make an appointment with Dr. Harris, please.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I've had a dull pain in my stomach since last week.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I'd like to see Dr. Harris as soon as possible.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Dr. Harris is available this Wednesday at 1 P.M.,

Challenge #6.spoken_text: this Friday at 8 A.M.,

Challenge #7.spoken_text: or next Thursday at 7:30 P.M.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Friday would work.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I usually drop my children off at school around that time.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: No problem.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: If anything comes up between now and then, please let us know.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: He said he's on his way to the office, but he's stuck in traffic.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: What do we do now?

Challenge #4.spoken_text: He was supposed to bring the bouquet and the congratulatory message to the inauguration ceremony.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Did he mention how far he was?

Challenge #6.spoken_text: No, but he did say there was no way to bypass the traffic jam since only one lane was open.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: That doesn't look good.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: We need to get a copy of that message.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: Can you print it out from my computer?

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Call me again when you turn it on.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: You'll need a password to log in to the system.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: What about the flowers?

Challenge #13.spoken_text: They are for the last part of the ceremony.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: I'm sure Kenny will show up by the time we need them.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I was calling to inquire about a delivery that I am expecting for an order I placed online.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: It is for a refrigerator.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Okay.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I know that a lot of our refrigerator deliveries have been a couple weeks behind

Challenge #6.spoken_text: because we had trouble finding the coolant material in stock.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: What is the name your order was placed under?

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Regina Green.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: My order reference number is U9OP2.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Okay, found it.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: It looks like your order has been shipped and should arrive sometime tomorrow afternoon.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: That is good news, but I never got an email.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: I have plans tomorrow morning, but I should be back by 12 P.M.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Do you think it will come before then?

Challenge #15.spoken_text: I will put a special note for delivering your item after 12 P.M.

Challenge #16.spoken_text: We can't normally do this, but since this is an extenuating circumstance, we can allow it just this once.

Challenge #17.spoken_text: Is there anything else I can help you with?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I wanted to reach out to ask a couple of questions regarding small business banking.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I know there are several forms I need to fill out,

Challenge #4.spoken_text: but what other information is needed to start a business account?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: So, for the most basic business account,

Challenge #6.spoken_text: there is a mandatory deposit of at least $10,000.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: The process is pretty straight forward.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: An account manager will look over the forms you fill out today,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: we will cross-check that you have the funds,

Challenge #10.spoken_text: and then you will receive an approval or denial.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: When everything is filled out correctly the first time,

Challenge #12.spoken_text: we can usually come to a result within 48 hours.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Oh, that seems easy enough.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Does the basic account include access to the banking app?

Challenge #15.spoken_text: I run a small business,

Challenge #16.spoken_text: so I would like people to have the option to pay through a bank transfer.

Challenge #19.spoken_text: It is possible to receive payments via a bank transfer to your business account,

Challenge #20.spoken_text: and we also have card scanners that you can use if you have a physical store.

Challenge #21.spoken_text: If your business is an e-commerce shop,

Challenge #23.spoken_text: which is helpful for taxes and bookkeeping.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hello Gary. I have an exciting announcement.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: The business came to an agreement to take over The Builder's Architect,

Challenge #3.spoken_text: another architecture firm here in Manchester.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Oh, wow!

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I wasn't aware there was a merger happening.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: When will the deal be finalized?

Challenge #7.spoken_text: It will be final on December 4.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Okay, great.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: That is just over a month away.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Will the employees from The Builder's Architect be joining our payroll following the acquisition?

Challenge #11.spoken_text: We will retain the employees for the time being

Challenge #12.spoken_text: and perform evaluations to determine if we release them.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Ah, okay.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: I should let my employees know.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: Yes, if you can tell them as soon as possible, that would be great.

Challenge #16.spoken_text: I will be speaking at a press conference this afternoon.

Challenge #17.spoken_text: No problem, I will let them know now.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: This isn't the drink I ordered.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: Oh, really?

Challenge #4.spoken_text: What did you order again?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Well, I ordered a large iced decaf latte,

Challenge #6.spoken_text: with one shot of espresso,

Challenge #7.spoken_text: four pumps of caramel syrup,

Challenge #8.spoken_text: soy milk, and extra whipped cream on top.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: So sorry about that.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Oh, I can't believe I mixed up your order.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: Do you mind waiting for a few minutes?

Challenge #12.spoken_text: I'll make you a new one.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Well, mistakes happen.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: And, uh, don't worry about making a new one.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: I'll take it as it is since I'm in a bit of a rush.

Challenge #17.spoken_text: Please let me give you a 100% off drink coupon.

Challenge #18.spoken_text: Your next cup of coffee will be on the house.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hello. I'm here for an oil change.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I believe it's long overdue.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: Well, the earliest a mechanic can get to it is Thursday.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Is that alright?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Yeah, no kidding, you have cars lined up one after another in the garage.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: It'll be fine as long as I can pick it up before I leave for a trade fair in Chicago on Saturday.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: I see.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Looks like you'll be driving a long distance.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: You might be interested in one of our maintenance packages.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Right, I suppose I should also get my engine checked and brake fluid changed.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hello, this is Jack O'Connell, from Jack's Grocery Store.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I need to speak with Miss Richards.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: She is my store's account manager.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I apologize, but Miss Richards is currently in a meeting with the senior account managers.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Would you like to leave a message for when she is available?

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I would.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Can you let her know that I was calling because I would like to check the progress of my building's remortgage application?

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Of course.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I will give her this message and ask her to call you back as soon as the meeting has finished.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: We're all done here.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: The remaining tests should be done at a larger facility,

Challenge #4.spoken_text: like the general hospital on Cambie Street.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Oh, no.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: I thought we would be able to do all of the tests right here.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: I've had multiple unpleasant experiences at the general hospital.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: I prefer the memorial hospital, to be honest.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I'd like to help,

Challenge #10.spoken_text: but the latest diagnostic equipment is required to perform certain tests,

Challenge #11.spoken_text: like the ones in your case.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Let me refer you to the memorial hospital.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: I'm sure you will be in good hands.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: That would be great. Thanks.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: I just connected a web camera to my computer,

Challenge #2.spoken_text: but the sound is slightly out of sync.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: Did you update the software to the latest version?

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I sure did. I asked Thomas for help.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: He installed the web camera driver on my computer last month,

Challenge #6.spoken_text: so I figured it would work just fine.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Do you mean Thomas from the technical support?

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Didn't he quit sometime last week?

Challenge #9.spoken_text: I meant Thomas from the marketing department.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: That doesn't matter, though.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: What matters now is that I need the camera up and running for an online conference tomorrow morning.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: I'll call the IT department now,

Challenge #13.spoken_text: and hopefully they will send someone quickly.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I received the email you sent yesterday afternoon.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I think it looks great, but I do need to make one revision.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Sure. What is it?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Are the quotes totally off?

Challenge #6.spoken_text: It was a difficult thing to check with all the different countries.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Well, most of them look okay.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: I am unsure about the living costs in Athens.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: The last time I was there for an extended time,

Challenge #10.spoken_text: I found myself spending more than what you estimated.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I think prices have sky-rocketed in the last year.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Oh, that would make sense.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: I used data that the firm gathered, but it was from two years ago.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: I will reach out to some contacts and see if we can get current quotes.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: GreenValley Electronics is having a huge online sale tomorrow.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: Aren't you looking to buy a camera?

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Oh, really?

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I have my eyes on the Fujiwa Alpha 800,

Challenge #6.spoken_text: but I can't seem to decide without seeing it in person.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: I wonder if this supplier offers the same deals at its physical locations.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Hmm I'm not sure either.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: But I did see the camera you're looking for at one of the company's brick-and-mortar stores while I was there.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: It's this new model that was launched just last week, isn't it?

Challenge #11.spoken_text: Why don't you give this store a call and find out?

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Right, but I think I'll just drop by this afternoon.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: I can't wait to test out the camera.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: It's been a month since I subscribed to Phenix Stream,

Challenge #2.spoken_text: but I still can't have it installed.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: It's so frustrating!

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I really should've read the online reviews of this cable service provider closely.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: That's outrageous.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: It shouldn't take this long to get your cable TV set up.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Have you tried the company's customer hotline?

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Yeah, just this morning.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: But the agent said they no longer provide professional installation;

Challenge #10.spoken_text: instead, a technician will guide me through the installation steps over the phone.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: That is just absurd.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Well, I've been telling you to switch to Tik TV.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: It's an online streaming service,

Challenge #14.spoken_text: so no installation is required.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: It also offers a huge selection of on-demand programs.

Challenge #16.spoken_text: Here, let me write down its web address for you.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: I am in charge of the advertising for Qwixx Dish Pods

Challenge #3.spoken_text: and need to put together a presentation for the marketing manager by Monday.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: You were in charge of the Dishwasher Detergent campaign,

Challenge #5.spoken_text: so do you have any recommendations on what I should include?

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Sure thing.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: The first step I always take is to look at the data that has been gathered

Challenge #8.spoken_text: and figure out your target consumer audience.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: Yep, I finished that earlier today.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: It seems the majority of our consumers are middle-aged women.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: I believe that is what your proposal was suited for.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Which method of advertising did you find most beneficial?

Challenge #13.spoken_text: We primarily used the internet, social media advertisements, and influencers.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: We ran a few commercials on TV.,

Challenge #15.spoken_text: but after looking back at the data,

Challenge #16.spoken_text: this age group gets online to seek out recommendations on household items.

Challenge #17.spoken_text: I will have my secretary send over my presentation this afternoon,

Challenge #18.spoken_text: so you can have a look.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: This is Leonard speaking.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: How can I help you?

Challenge #4.spoken_text: Oh, hi.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: I bought a Philis Brand air purifier from you.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: The model number is AP1105.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: The control panel is unresponsive.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: I tried unplugging the power cord and plugging it back in,

Challenge #9.spoken_text: but it just won't power on.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Don't worry, let's figure it out.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: Umm First, insert the filters in the air purifier housing,

Challenge #12.spoken_text: and then replace the front grille.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Note that you should fix it in place by twisting it.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Next, press and hold the reset button for 5 seconds

Challenge #15.spoken_text: to reset the filter lifetime counter.

Challenge #17.spoken_text: I can't believe I missed the last step.

Challenge #18.spoken_text: I should've read the manual in the first place.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: It's Molly, I'm calling from my cell phone.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I just got back from lunch and my company phone won't work.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I am sure it is connected because I hear a dial-tone,

Challenge #5.spoken_text: but I can't make any calls out.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Are you sure all the wires are pushed into the back of the console?

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Yes, I double checked before I called you.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: Okay. Is the screen on the phone working?

Challenge #9.spoken_text: There should be a green light that comes on when you pick up the phone.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: Hmm.. No, actually when I pick up the phone a red light comes on.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: Ah, okay!

Challenge #12.spoken_text: That actually means there is a problem with the phone line.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: This happened once last year.

Challenge #14.spoken_text: Stay put, and I am going to come to check it out.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: I'm on my way to the first floor right now.

Challenge #2.spoken_text: Three tickets to Rock Rose's concert!

Challenge #3.spoken_text: How did you get the tickets?

Challenge #4.spoken_text: I heard the tickets were all sold out within 5 minutes of going on sale.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Don't tell me you bought them from scalpers.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: No. I got them from Gwyneth.

Challenge #7.spoken_text: She had to give them up because she will be hosting a training seminar this weekend.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: So do you want to come with me?

Challenge #9.spoken_text: Absolutely.

Challenge #10.spoken_text: By the way, Ron has been a diehard fan of the band,

Challenge #11.spoken_text: and he's been trying to get his hands on the ticket.

Challenge #12.spoken_text: Can he come too?

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Of course!

Challenge #14.spoken_text: The three of us are going to have so much fun.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: Thanks!

Challenge #17.spoken_text: I really hope the band will perform its first album at the concert.

Challenge #1.spoken_text: Hey Brittany. Are you still planning the design conference for the company?

Challenge #2.spoken_text: Yes, I am.

Challenge #3.spoken_text: I've never done anything like this and underestimated the amount of work it requires.

Challenge #4.spoken_text: My current task is finding an opening speaker.

Challenge #5.spoken_text: Ah, a good opening speech is important to the flow of the rest of the conference.

Challenge #6.spoken_text: Are you looking for someone internally, or open to a guest-speaker?

Challenge #7.spoken_text: Well, I am open to either.

Challenge #8.spoken_text: I have already reached out to a few people who aren't available.

Challenge #9.spoken_text: Did you speak to Elisa Lowe?

Challenge #10.spoken_text: She is an expert in user-centered design.

Challenge #11.spoken_text: Yes, unfortunately, she will be out of the office that day for her son's graduation,

Challenge #12.spoken_text: so it can't be rearranged.

Challenge #13.spoken_text: Well, did you hear that we recently hired Slyvia Tee for our head of product design?

Challenge #14.spoken_text: She isn't due to start work until next week, but she has a lot of great experience.

Challenge #15.spoken_text: Oh, I have heard her speak at a networking event.

Challenge #16.spoken_text: I didn't know she was joining the team, but that is great news.

Challenge #17.spoken_text: I will definitely reach out to her.

Challenge #18.spoken_text: I worked with her years ago, so I can give you her phone number.

Challenge #19.spoken_text: Or, I'm sure you can reach out to HR for her email.
